entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 10:03 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
